name: BlockGL
description:
I decided that maybe I should make my own game that has a minecraft-Like style to it. Here you can build structures, Buildings, etc. Note: This game is not even closed to being done...In fact, This is a test, I wouldn't say a prototype, but more of a early access, unfinished game. It needs a LOT of work. Here are a list of things I am thinking about adding

1. Day/Night Cycle | 2. Fish | 3. Trees | 4. Fps camera Collision. | 5. Flowers

6. Fire Block |7.  Lightning | 8. Electricity Block | 9. Water | 10.  Rabbits |

W, A, S, D To move/float around, Click to pick up blocks: Game is still in early development!!!

Made in Coppercube 6
